translation.en: [girl] Okay, class, today's song is "The Clapping Song" by Shirley Ellis.
translation.fr: Aujourd'hui, nous allons chanter "The Clapping Song" de Shirley Ellis.

translation.en: When you sing, I want to hear every word clearly and succinctly.
translation.fr: Je veux vous entendre prononcer chaque mot distinctement.

translation.en: Yumi?
[Yumi] Can you sing it first, Amber?
After we see how you do it, we sing much better.
translation.fr: Si tu nous montres comment faire, c'est plus facile.

translation.en: [women in class] Please!
[Amber] Okay, okay. Um, but just the first verse.
[Amber] Thank you, thank you. Okay. Is everyone ready?
-[all] Yes! -Okay, stand up.
[clears throat] Now, what do we have to remember, my Divas?
[all] Sell the word! And?
[all] Soul claps!
Exactly! Hit it, Father Chee.
Thank you very much.
-♪ Clap pat... ♪ -Give me soul claps!
The biggest claps you could give me.
translation.fr: Aussi fort que vous le pouvez.

translation.en: Very nice!
Father Chee. I need soul claps. Come on.
translation.fr: Père Chee, applaudissez avec nous. Allez !

translation.en: All right, are you ready for this verse?
I need to hear every single word as clear as you can!
And then I need soul claps too.
And ready!
♪ Now she won't buy me ♪
-Thanks, Lloyd. -You bet.
Oh, check this out.
I passed.
[laughing] Oh, dude! So proud.
translation.fr: Ça alors, je suis fière de toi !

translation.en: All thanks to you.
Thank you. Have a good night.
♪ I'd kissed a soldier ♪
translation.fr: D'APRÈS LE ROMAN SORTA LIKE A ROCK STAR DE MATTHEW QUICK

translation.en: ♪ Slap pat Clap slap ♪
Are you still hungry, Bobby Big Boy?
translation.fr: Tu as faim, Bobby Big Boy ?

translation.en: Good job!
Mom.
-[Mom] Hi, baby. -You're late. Where have you been?
translation.fr: - Bonsoir, chérie. - Tu es en retard.

translation.en: I know, I know. But I brought you something.
translation.fr: Je sais. Mais j'ai quelque chose pour toi.

translation.en: Look.
Got you some dinner.
This is dessert.
Who says dessert can't be dinner?
-[Amber] Uh, nutritionists? -[chuckles] You telling me nutritionists don’t like cheesecake?
translation.fr: - Pas selon les nutritionnistes. - Ils n'aiment pas le cheesecake ?

translation.en: This is from the Copper Kettle.
Did you sit at the bar?
I had one glass of wine.
-Just one. -You're not supposed to have any.
translation.fr: - Juste un. - Tu n'aurais pas dû.

translation.en: But it was-- It was just one.
So Oliver’s back in the picture now?
No! No, not really. This just-- This is a way to get us some dinner.
translation.fr: Non, c'était simplement pour avoir de quoi dîner.

translation.en: This isn't dinner, Mom.
You were supposed to look at apartments, not get cheesecake from Oliver.
translation.fr: Tu étais censée chercher un appartement.

translation.en: Well, that's all that he could give me, so I took it,
translation.fr: C'est tout ce que j'ai trouvé.

translation.en: and I'm sorry that it's not good enough for you.
That's not...
Oh, it's so good.
Oh, it's really good, Mom, actually.
Here.
-No. I don't want any. -Have some. Don't be mad.
-Just a little bite. I promise. -I'm not mad.
translation.fr: - Ne fais pas la tête ! - Je ne fais pas la tête.

translation.en: It's the best cheesecake I've ever had and you're saying no.
translation.fr: C'est le meilleur cheesecake que j'aie jamais goûté.

translation.en: -Right? -Yes!
-It's very good. -Oh, it's so good.
-[Amber chuckling] -Oh! See? I told you!
translation.fr: Tu vois, je te l'avais dit.

translation.en: Thank you.
You're welcome.
[Amber] "Hope is the thing with feathers
That perches in the soul,
And sings the tune without the words,
And never stops at all,
And sweetest in the gale is heard;
translation.fr: Son chant est doux dans la bourrasque

translation.en: And sore must be the storm
That could abash the little bird
That kept so many warm.
I've heard it in the chillest land,
translation.fr: Il m'a suivi dans les pays froids

translation.en: And on the strangest sea..."
"Yet, never, in extremity,
It asked a crumb of me."
translation.fr: Ne m'a-t-il rien demandé en retour."

translation.en: "Sore must be the storm."
Some storm we're in, huh, baby?
translation.fr: On est dans une sacrée tempête.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It's not your fault.
We're gonna be okay.
Okay?
-[mock scoff] Way to aim low, Mom. -[chuckles]
translation.fr: Tu ne vises pas très haut.

translation.en: We're gonna be awesome.
We're-- we're gonna be spectacular.
That's my girl.
Up and at 'em, kid.
Bye, Mom. Bye, baby.
-Have a great day! -Thanks!
[Amber] Christian, John, good morning.
Would you like a donut today?
Thank you.
Thanks.
Good morning.
-Donut? -Thank you. Thanks.
Hey, Mr. Linder. It's me, Amber.
Remember me?
Are we related?
No, I work here on the weekends,
translation.fr: Non, je travaille ici le week-end.

translation.en: but I had some donuts, so I thought I'd stop by.
translation.fr: Je vous ai apporté des donuts.

translation.en: You want one?
Careful, it's a category three in there today.
translation.fr: Je te préviens, c'est une alerte de niveau trois.

translation.en: Could be worse.
-[woman] Who is it? -It's me!
[woman] Oh, I thought so. Scram!
-[Amber] Morning, Joan. -[door closes]
Has anyone ever told you that you are loud?
translation.fr: On ne t'a jamais dit que tu parlais trop fort ?

translation.en: [softly] Good morning, Joan.
-"Good" is a matter of opinion. -Well, here's a fact:
translation.fr: Qui te dit que c'est un "bon" jour ? Parce que je vous ai gardé le meilleur donut que j'avais.

translation.en: Rainbow sprinkled donut? The best donut, and I saved it for you.
translation.fr: Parce que je vous ai gardé le meilleur donut que j'avais.

translation.en: Okay. I'll eat it.
Some, uh, soothing entertainment to start your morning?
translation.fr: - C'est pour vous apaiser dès le matin ? - Oui.

translation.en: Right. Uh, could I use your shower? Our water heater's still on the fritz.
translation.fr: Super. Je peux utiliser la douche ? Notre chauffe-eau est cassé.

translation.en: You know, when I was your age, we didn't have hot showers.
translation.fr: Quand j'avais ton âge, on n'avait pas d'eau chaude.

translation.en: So, is that a no?
Be my guest.
Ooh. You wanna hear a joke? That's a no.
translation.fr: - Vous voulez une blague ? - Là, c'est non.

translation.en: You're gonna laugh this time. Ready?
What do you call a fish with no eyes?
translation.fr: Comment on appelle un poulet sans ailes ?

translation.en: Fsh!
Careful, Joan. One of these days, I will make you laugh.
translation.fr: Vous verrez, Joan. Un jour, je vous ferai rire.

translation.en: Not if I make you cry first.
You couldn't make me cry if you tried.
translation.fr: Je doute que vous y arriviez.

translation.en: Ricky! Good morning! Breakfast!
translation.fr: Ricky ! C'est l'heure du petit déjeuner !

translation.en: Ricky! Come on, dude, we have school!
[Ricky] My BB-8 clock said 7:12.
Yesterday, it was 7:13.
Tuesday, it was 7:14.
[Amber] What's your point?
You're waking me up a minute earlier every day.
translation.fr: Tu me réveilles une minute plus tôt chaque jour.

translation.en: You're on to me. The master plan is to eventually wake you up at 4:00 a.m.
translation.fr: Tu m'as démasquée. Je finirai par te réveiller à 4 h.

translation.en: Then midnight?
Then yesterday.
Before I even go to sleep!
Which would totally suck, but might be sort of cool,
translation.fr: Ce serait nul, mais cool quand même.

translation.en: because then we could eat breakfast together and stay up all night.
translation.fr: Après le petit déj', on discuterait toute la nuit.

translation.en: Uh-huh. Your mom's home. She's early, too.
translation.fr: - Ta mère est rentrée. - Elle est en avance.

translation.en: -It's a conspiracy. -[Ricky] No!
[Amber chuckles] Good morning, Donna.
-Hey, you two. -Hey, Mom.
How was work?
The night shift. It's, uh... life's rich pageant.
translation.fr: Travailler de nuit, c'est un plaisir toujours renouvelé.

translation.en: [Donna] Amber! Ty's here!
Please, don't get up.
[Donna] Amber!
You left this on the counter.
Right. Thank you.
-Bye, Mom. -Bye, sweetie.
translation.fr: - Au revoir. - Au revoir, mon chéri.

translation.en: Have a great day, Amber. Always.
Hendrix? Fox and Fox.
-Hey, Amber. -Hey.
Hey, Jordan, is that a coloring book?
Because there are Marquez all over the pages.
Impressive.
Thanks.
We've had 31 days of school, that's 31 rides.
translation.fr: On a eu 31 jours de cours, ça fait 31 trajets.

translation.en: Thirty-one sandwiches, too, am I right?
-So many sandwiches. -Okay, seriously, Ty deserves a sandwich
translation.fr: - Ça fait beaucoup. - Ty mérite bien un sandwich.

translation.en: because he has to leave the house way earlier than the rest of us.
translation.fr: Il part de chez lui plus tôt que nous.

translation.en: -And I'm the only one who owns a car. -That's true.
-A car? Okay. Well, this... Not a car. -Technically, I don't think you own it.
translation.fr: - Tu appelles ça une voiture ? - Et ce n'est pas la tienne.

translation.en: He's the only one with access to a car.
translation.fr: Peut-être, mais il y a accès.

translation.en: -Yes, thank you. Access. -[Jordan] Call it a vehicle.
I still fail to see how any of this warrants a sandwich.
translation.fr: Je ne vois pas en quoi ça lui vaut un sandwich.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Just sayin'.
translation.fr: - Merci. - Je dis ça comme ça.

translation.en: I think Amber's got a crush on Ty. That's why she makes him a sandwich.
translation.fr: Je crois que c'est parce que Amber a un faible pour Ty.

translation.en: Do you guys realize the marching band's been playing all year without a tuba?
translation.fr: Quand je pense que la fanfare n'a toujours pas de tuba.

translation.en: Somebody stole it over the summer.
Yeah, look at Ryan Gold. She looks weird.
translation.fr: Regardez Ryan Gold. Elle a l'air un peu ridicule.

translation.en: [Chad] She looks sad.
They’ve played half the football season without it.
translation.fr: S'ils n'ont pas de tuba pour la finale de football américain,

translation.en: Now that state championships are coming up, if they don’t have a tuba,
translation.fr: S'ils n'ont pas de tuba pour la finale de football américain, ils seront disqualifiés.

translation.en: -they’re automatically disqualified. -Okay, but who steals a tuba?
translation.fr: ils seront disqualifiés. Pourquoi voler un tuba ?

translation.en: Someone who’s really horny for it.
[Jordan] It’s technically a sousaphone.
You could get a lot of cash for one on the dark web.
translation.fr: Ça se vend bien sur le dark web.

translation.en: Why don't they get another one? Borrow it or rent it, I don't know.
translation.fr: Ils n'ont qu'à en emprunter ou en louer un.

translation.en: Sure, Ty. Why don’t you just lend Ryan your extra tuba?
translation.fr: Tu n'as qu'à leur prêter ton tuba de rechange.

translation.en: -"Sousaphone." -Nobody’s stepped up.
About three, four grand should do it for a proper marching model.
translation.fr: Il faut compter entre trois et quatre mille dollars.

translation.en: Is she on the dark web right now?
translation.fr: Tu es sur le dark web ?

translation.en: I say we make the tuba this year’s cause for the Variety Show.
translation.fr: On n'a qu'à en faire la cause du spectacle du lycée.

translation.en: Doesn't the school decide that?
Amber runs the Variety Show. She started it.
translation.fr: C'est Amber qui l'organise chaque année.

translation.en: But how do we get people excited over a tuba?
translation.fr: Les gens s'en fichent, du tuba.

translation.en: Oh, my God, "sousaphone."
I don't know, but we have to. Just look at Ryan.
translation.fr: On doit faire quelque chose. Pauvre Ryan !

translation.en: -Hey, Amber. -Hey, Leah.
Leah is awesome. You know, she's auditioning for Oklahoma! this year?
translation.fr: Tu sais que Leah va postuler pour Oklahoma! cette année ?

translation.en: Is that right?
-You know where this is going, Ty. -Yeah, I do.
translation.fr: - Tu sais où je veux en venir. - Oui.

translation.en: Come on! Mr. Franks thinks you'd make a great Curly. We all do.
translation.fr: M. Franks, tout le monde dit que tu serais super en Curly.

translation.en: -We need you this year. -I don't know.
translation.fr: - On a besoin de toi. - Écoute,

translation.en: Getting on stage in front of all those people, it's terrifying.
translation.fr: j'ai trop peur d'être sur scène devant tout le monde.

translation.en: You play soccer in front of all those people.
translation.fr: Tu joues au foot devant tout le monde.

translation.en: Yeah, but I don't have to bust out with a show tune. [scoffs]
translation.fr: Oui, mais je ne suis pas obligé de chanter.

translation.en: Or wear a cowboy hat. I think you'd look great in a cowboy hat.
translation.fr: - Ni de porter un chapeau de cow-boy. - Ça t'irait bien.

translation.en: I've been trying to text you, but I keep on getting delivery failure.
translation.fr: Les textos que je t'envoie n'arrivent jamais.

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, that's a whole thing.
I lost my phone, and I haven't had a chance to get a new one yet.
translation.fr: J'ai perdu mon portable, je n'en ai pas encore racheté un.

translation.en: I was hoping we could have, like...
a private conversation.
Cell phones aren't private. It's much better to stay off-grid.
translation.fr: Pas par texto, alors. C'est tout sauf privé.

translation.en: Plus, I'm the only teenager in all of America who doesn't have a cell phone.
translation.fr: Je suis la seule ado du pays à ne pas avoir de portable.

translation.en: How cool is that?
Not cool at all?
[Ty] So, it--it takes place in, um, I'm assuming Oklahoma.
translation.fr: J'imagine que ça se passe en Oklahoma.

translation.en: [Ricky] Yes! So, that's why...
That's why we're trying to bring you in.
translation.fr: On a besoin de toi pour ça.

translation.en: Hey, guys.
-Hey, Mr. Franks. -Franks!
Dig your shirt. Mr. Franks.
That's very nice of you. Thank you very much.
Yeah, what's, uh, going on over there?
You know, it's just sort of some outdoor tableaus.
translation.fr: Ce sont des scènes en plein air.

translation.en: You know, some people listening to music, and sitting on a park bench.
translation.fr: Des gens qui écoutent de la musique, ou qui sont au parc.

translation.en: -Trees, and tennis, and... -[Jordan] It's stylish. I like it.
translation.fr: Il y a des arbres, tout ça... C'est sympa.

translation.en: [Ty] I like it. Do one of 'em have a-- One has a mullet.
translation.fr: Il y en a un avec une coupe mulet.

translation.en: -It's very '80s. I like that. -[Chad] Yeah, it's very you. We approve.
translation.fr: - Ça fait très années 1980. - Ça vous va bien.

translation.en: -Franks. -[Franks] Not necessarily the '80s, but...
-Oh, maybe it is. -Mr. Franks?
Appleton?
[Amber] Can I show you something?
Sure.
-Just... -What am I looking at?
Whoa!
translation.fr: VOUS AVEZ ÉTÉ SÉLECTIONNÉE POUR PARTICIPER À UNE AUDITION.

translation.en: Wow, look at that!
-Does that mean that I-- -Yeah. You're being asked to audition at Carnegie Mellon.
translation.fr: - Ça veut dire que... - Carnegie-Mellon t'invite à une audition.

translation.en: -Amber's going to Pittsburgh. Look! -What?
Of course she is.
-That's amazing. -No way!
[Chad] This is your dream, Amber.
That's incredible! Oh, my God!
[Chad] What song are you going to sing?
[Ricky] Pittsburgh? How are you going to get to Pittsburgh?
translation.fr: Comment tu vas faire pour aller à Pittsburgh ?

translation.en: Good boy.
Mom?
I'm sorry, baby.
I was so tired, I just fell asleep.
translation.fr: J'étais épuisée, je me suis endormie.

translation.en: At Oliver's.
You have his truck.
He's asked us to move in.
translation.fr: Il veut qu'on habite chez lui.

translation.en: And I think we should do it.
So everything's fine now?
He has a good side.
Yeah, and a bad side.
translation.fr: Oui, et de mauvais côtés aussi.

translation.en: We're gonna get caught.
And it is getting cold outside.
translation.fr: Et il commence à faire froid.

translation.en: I'd rather freeze my ass off on a bus than go back to Oliver's.
translation.fr: Je préfère me geler dans un bus que de retourner là-bas.

translation.en: Why? He wants to help,
and we still don't have enough money for an apartment.
translation.fr: On n'a pas les moyens de louer un appartement.

translation.en: What if we tried the shelter again?
No, I'm not going to the shelter. No.
So that I can have people questioning my parenting?
translation.fr: On va encore me reprocher ma façon de t'élever.

translation.en: No one can find out about us. You understand?
translation.fr: Personne ne doit être au courant. Tu comprends ?

translation.en: Because if they do, I'll lose you.
translation.fr: Si ça se sait, je te perdrai.

translation.en: Let's just talk about this when you're in a better mood.
translation.fr: On en reparlera quand tu seras de meilleure humeur.

translation.en: I got invited to audition for Carnegie Mellon.
translation.fr: J'ai été prise pour une audition à Carnegie-Mellon.

translation.en: What?
My God.
Your dad would be so proud.
How does it work? You sing for them?
translation.fr: Comment ça marche ? Tu vas chanter ?

translation.en: Yeah. And then they crush my dreams.
translation.fr: Et ensuite, ils brisent mes rêves.

translation.en: They won't. You're gonna be great.
translation.fr: Ça n'arrivera pas. Ça va très bien se passer.

translation.en: How am I even gonna get to Pittsburgh?
translation.fr: Comment je vais aller à Pittsburgh ?

translation.en: You've been saving money, right?
Yeah, for an apartment, not some stupid audition.
translation.fr: Pour un appartement, pas pour ça.

translation.en: No, you buy that ticket.
Because this is your dream.
You see?
Things are lookin' up.
We're gonna be great.
Without Oliver.
Okay. [sighs]
So what's with you today?
You're not yappin' all over the game like you usually do.
translation.fr: Tu ne jacasses pas comme à ton habitude.

translation.en: Nothing. I'm just thinking.
About that boyfriend of yours?
I don't have a boyfriend.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas de petit ami.

translation.en: Ty's a friend. We're buds.
translation.fr: Ty est un ami. On est potes.

translation.en: "Buds." Buds, yeah.
Have you hooked up with him yet? Joan!
Get over it, and quit wasting your time thinking.
translation.fr: Alors oublie ça et ne perds pas ton temps en rêveries.

translation.en: Youth is precious, so you should enjoy it.
translation.fr: La jeunesse est trop précieuse pour qu'on la gâche.

translation.en: That's the most positive thing I think I've ever heard you say.
translation.fr: C'est très beau, pour une fois.

translation.en: Well, it's just another way of saying that life is nasty, brutish, and short.
translation.fr: C'est une autre façon de dire que la vie est laide, impitoyable et trop courte.

translation.en: And then you die.
That's my Joanie.
Okay, Ricky. Egg puns. Go.
translation.fr: Ricky, des jeux de mots sur les œufs. Vas-y.

translation.en: Well, I only know a few, so this will be over easy.
translation.fr: J'ai bien peur que mes blagues ne tombent "sur le plat".

translation.en: Omelet you use that one if you want.
translation.fr: Je ne voudrais pas qu'on se brouille.

translation.en: You can poach it. Ooh, nice.
translation.fr: - Je suis un peu toqué, tu sais. - Pas mal !

translation.en: Yeah, it's funny, because... I usually only eat eggs around hollandaise.
translation.fr: Si je t'agace, tu n'as qu'à me dire d'aller me faire cuire un œuf.

translation.en: -Good morning, honey. -Good morning, Mom.
-Hey. -Sorry, did we wake you up?
No, I was up already.
Can I talk to you for a minute?
I noticed you've been using my makeup.
Oh. Donna, I'm so sorry.
It's okay. I used to dip into my sister's makeup all the time, but it's kind of gross. So...
translation.fr: Ça ne fait rien, je comprends. Mais il n'est pas de très bonne qualité.

translation.en: I got you this.
Thank you.
But I can't take this.
What do you mean? Sure you can.
No, I just-- I don't wear makeup.
I was practicing. I'm really sorry.
It's a gift.
I know, and it's really great. I just-- I don't need it.
translation.fr: Je sais, et c'est très gentil. Mais je n'en ai pas besoin.

translation.en: Amber, are you all right?
translation.fr: Tu es sûre que ça va ?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm great. Never better.
translation.fr: Bien sûr, on ne peut mieux.

translation.en: Poetry. Sweet. Thank you.
translation.fr: POUR UN NOUVEAU TUBA ! De la poésie, super. Merci !

translation.en: The tuba's a great cause, and I know you'd shine up there.
translation.fr: C'est pour le tuba. Tu vas assurer !

translation.en: I don't have any real skills, Amber.
Sure, you do. When you close your eyes, what do you imagine yourself doing?
translation.fr: Bien sûr que si. Ferme les yeux et imagine-toi sur scène.

translation.en: Tommy, you're going to kill it.
But what if I eat it? You won't! You won't!
translation.fr: - Et si je me rate ? - Mais non !

translation.en: Okay. Okay, fine. Fine.
-Awesome, can't wait to hear it. -Thank you.
Thanks so much.
Okay. So, Ricky's gonna do a pun-off.
translation.fr: Ricky nous fera des jeux de mots.

translation.en: -Put me down as Lingo Starr. -I love it.
Chad, you're going to wow us with some thespianism, right?
translation.fr: Chad, tu nous joueras une petite scène.

translation.en: -That's the plan. -Awesome. Ty?
Uh, I thought I'd stage manage. Help out with the behind-the-scenes stuff.
translation.fr: Je ferai le régisseur. Je serai dans les coulisses.

translation.en: Come on! You've gotta do something up there. You're so talented.
translation.fr: Tu dois monter sur scène ! Tu es si talentueux.

translation.en: He’s only good at soccer as far as we know.
translation.fr: Il est bon en foot, c'est tout.

translation.en: [Chad] He does have some talent.
Exactly! And this is your chance to show everyone
translation.fr: C'est l'occasion de montrer à tout le monde

translation.en: how very talented you are, and also charismatic.
translation.fr: à quel point tu es talentueux et charismatique.

translation.en: So, think about it, please?
-Okay, yeah, I'll think about it. -Yes! All right.
Jordan?
I'll be performing an Argentine tango.
-Oh. -An Argentine tango.
Correct.
I can finally tell you my sister watches a little too much Dancing with the Stars.
translation.fr: Je crois que ma sœur a trop regardé Danse avec les stars.

translation.en: A, That is a lie. B, please put me down for an Argentine tango.
translation.fr: N'importe quoi. Inscris-moi pour le tango.

translation.en: You do realize it takes two human beings to tango, right?
translation.fr: Tu es au courant que ça se danse à deux ?

translation.en: Put me down as “Jordan and TBD.”
Okay. Uh, Franksie?
Me? No. This is for you guys. I'm not gonna get involved.
translation.fr: Moi ? Non. C'est votre truc, je vous laisse faire.

translation.en: -What? Are you kidding? -Come on, man. Really?
-You have to help us out. -[Ricky] Do it.
-Are you sure? -[Amber] Yes, we're sure.
All right. I'll think of something.
"All the world's a stage.
The end."
Right? Is that what it is? I don't know. I have work to do, guys.
translation.fr: C'est bien ça, non ? J'ai du travail.

translation.en: [Amber] Two-forty, 260, 280, 300.
Okay, you know the school can help foot the bill for this.
translation.fr: Le lycée peut t'aider à couvrir les frais.

translation.en: There's this discretionary fund for students in need.
translation.fr: Il y a un fonds pour les élèves dans le besoin.

translation.en: Okay, but I'm not in need. I am flush.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas nécessaire. J'ai plein de fric !

translation.en: All right.
One ticket to Pittsburgh, coming right up.
translation.fr: Un billet pour Pittsburgh, c'est parti !

translation.en: Carnegie Mellon will not know what hit them.
translation.fr: Carnegie-Mellon n'a qu'à bien se tenir.

translation.en: What's going on?
They found out.
Who found out?
Who do you think?
I got fired.
Good riddance. [scoffs]
You're drunk.
I got fired.
I got fired. I had two drinks. I'm not drunk.
translation.fr: Ils m'ont virée. J'ai bu deux verres, je ne suis pas saoule.

translation.en: How did they find out? I don't know.
translation.fr: - Comment ils l'ont su ? - Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: Did you say something?
Did we leave something behind?
It doesn't matter. They found out.
translation.fr: Peu importe, ils sont au courant.

translation.en: Who was that?
Oliver's coming to pick us up.
I can't believe you.
translation.fr: Je n'arrive pas à y croire.

translation.en: Amber!
I know. I'm sorry.
We'll just sit here.
My backpack.
I had my money in there.
My school books.
My dad's hoodie.
It's all gone.
It's okay.
Hey, it's okay.
No, it's not.
I don't know what to do, Ty.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas quoi faire, Ty.

translation.en: My mom's gonna be looking for me,
and I can't go back to Oliver's.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas aller chez Oliver.

translation.en: Let's just...
Let's think about this, okay?
Today's Saturday.
We don't have school on Monday.
I have an idea.
Just...
trust me, okay?
[Ty] It’s a really important audition, Mom.
I thought the peace and quiet would do Amber a lot of good.
translation.fr: Amber a besoin de calme et de sérénité.

translation.en: Plus, we've got such a good piano up here, I don't see why we wouldn't use it.
translation.fr: On a un très bon piano ici qu'on peut utiliser.

translation.en: No, I get that. I'm sorry. You're right. I should have told you.
translation.fr: Je suis désolé, j'aurais dû t'en parler.

translation.en: She's just a friend, Mom.
Nobody's going to be partying up here, we're gonna be practicing.
translation.fr: On ne va pas faire la fête, on va juste répéter.

translation.en: "Feels Like Home."
My dad wrote it.
He was...
an amazing musician.
And singer.
Runs in the family, I guess.
You want to try it?
All right, ready when you are.
♪ Oh, I ♪
♪ Saw the truth ♪
♪ When I first ♪
♪ Laid eyes on you ♪
♪ I didn’t know it But my life had changed ♪
translation.fr: Ma vie aujourd'hui recommence Sans m'en être aperçu

translation.en: ♪ In ways I couldn’t rearrange ♪
♪ And all I saw was you ♪
♪ You burnt bright like fire ♪ ♪ In the pouring rain ♪
♪ Those things I couldn’t explain ♪
♪ Oh, what I saw in you ♪
♪ Take me, I’m ready ♪
♪ Go slow, but go steady ♪
translation.fr: Je n'entends plus que ta voix

translation.en: ♪ To a place that we can call our own ♪
translation.fr: Il y a une place pour nous à l'horizon

translation.en: ♪ I wanna know what feels like home ♪
translation.fr: Dis-moi ce qu'est une vraie maison

translation.en: ♪ Take me, I’m ready ♪
♪ Go slow, but go steady ♪
translation.fr: Je n'entends plus que ta voix

translation.en: ♪ To a place that we can call our own ♪
translation.fr: Il y a une place pour nous à l'horizon

translation.en: ♪ I wanna know what feels like home ♪
translation.fr: Dis-moi ce qu'est une vraie maison

translation.en: ♪ To you ♪
♪ Take me, I’m ready ♪
♪ Go slow, but go steady ♪
translation.fr: Je n'entends plus que ta voix

translation.en: ♪ To a place that we can call our own ♪
translation.fr: Il y a une place pour nous à l'horizon

translation.en: ♪ I wanna know what feels like home ♪
translation.fr: Dis-moi ce qu'est une vraie maison

translation.en: ♪ To you ♪
How did I sound?
[Ty] Terrible.
I'm sorry, but you have zero talent.
translation.fr: Désolé, mais tu n'as aucun talent.

translation.en: It was just... That was embarrassing. I was embarrassed for you.
translation.fr: C'était vraiment gênant. À ta place, je serais mort de honte.

translation.en: Yeah, you're the worst.
He wrote that song for my mom.
translation.fr: Il l'a écrit pour ma mère.

translation.en: I was twelve.
It was a heart thing.
Never even knew anything was wrong with it.
translation.fr: Je ne savais pas qu'il était malade.

translation.en: My mom tried to keep it together.
translation.fr: Ma mère a dû joindre les deux bouts.

translation.en: She just didn't have any family around.
translation.fr: Mais elle n'avait plus de famille.

translation.en: So little by little, things started to go downhill.
translation.fr: Petit à petit, les choses se sont dégradées.

translation.en: When we got evicted, we moved in with Oliver.
translation.fr: Après l'expulsion, on est allées chez Oliver.

translation.en: First night we got there, they went out drinking.
translation.fr: Le premier soir, ils sont allés au bar.

translation.en: She'd been sober for five months.
translation.fr: Elle était sobre depuis cinq mois.

translation.en: Then one night, he hit her.
And we moved out,
to the bus.
We're going to figure something out, all right?
Good morning!
It's pretty nice, huh?
-What's so funny? -[laughing]
Thanks.
This has been really great.
Anytime.
You sure about this?
I trust Donna.
Oh, hey, Amber.
Ricky's over at Chad and Jordan's practicing for the Variety Show.
translation.fr: Ricky est chez Chad et Jordan pour répéter le spectacle.

translation.en: Yeah, I actually came to see you.
translation.fr: C'est vous que je suis venue voir.

translation.en: I need to tell you something.
translation.fr: J'ai quelque chose à vous dire.

translation.en: I don't understand what's going on here.
We just want to discuss some things with you, Becky.
translation.fr: Nous voulons simplement discuter avec vous, Becky.

translation.en: Well, I, uh, came here to pick up my daughter,
translation.fr: Je suis venue chercher ma fille.

translation.en: because she was missing all weekend and I was worried sick,
translation.fr: J'étais morte d'inquiétude tout le week-end.

translation.en: and I don't really want to discuss anything with you.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien à vous dire.

translation.en: So, Amber, let's go.
Don't look at her.
What are you looking at her for?
Amber wants you to know she doesn't feel comfortable living at Oliver's.
translation.fr: Amber n'a pas envie de vivre chez Oliver.

translation.en: So you two talked about everything, huh?
translation.fr: Tu lui as tout raconté, alors ?

translation.en: Well, it may not be comfortable, but that is where we live now.
translation.fr: Peu importe ce qu'elle veut, c'est là qu'on habite.

translation.en: I don't wanna live there again.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas y aller.

translation.en: I don't feel safe.
You felt safer living on a bus?
I just think--
I don't care what you think.
Amber, let's go.
Donna says I can stay here for a few nights, until we figure this out.
translation.fr: Donna accepte que je reste ici le temps de trouver autre chose.

translation.en: No. Absolutely not. No.
-[Donna] It's okay, Becky. -No, it's not.
Who-- Who do you think you are? Really?
translation.fr: Vous vous prenez pour qui, vous ?

translation.en: It is not okay.
She is my daughter. She stays with me.
translation.fr: - C'est ma fille. Elle vient avec moi. - Calmez-vous.

translation.en: -Calm down. -I am calm.
I'm not going anywhere with you until you move out of Oliver's.
translation.fr: Je ne viendrai pas si tu vis chez lui.

translation.en: If you keep her here, I'm calling the cops.
translation.fr: Alors, je vais appeler la police.

translation.en: Well, maybe that's not a bad idea.
Maybe we all need to have a conversation about this.
translation.fr: Nous leur demanderons ce qu'ils en pensent.

translation.en: I'm the mother.
I'm the one that keeps things together.
Really, Mom? You do that? I had no idea.
I'm trying.
Can't you-- You can't see that I'm trying to take care of you? I'm doing my best.
translation.fr: Je fais tout ce que je peux pour prendre soin de toi.

translation.en: Well, your best isn't good enough.
Then stay here.
Stay here for the rest of your life for all I care.
translation.fr: Tu n'as qu'à rester ici toute ta vie, si tu veux.

translation.en: Mom!
Don't go back there. Please?
Then where do I go?
What am I supposed to do?
translation.fr: Tu veux que je fasse quoi ?

translation.en: You need help.
And we can get you help. We can start over.
translation.fr: On trouvera de l'aide. On repartira à zéro.

translation.en: [softly] "Start over."
Life is so much more complicated than you think, baby.
translation.fr: La vie est bien plus compliquée que tu ne le crois, ma chérie.

translation.en: You got everything you need?
translation.fr: Tu as tout ce qu'il te faut ?

translation.en: I'm really sorry for putting you in the middle of all this.
translation.fr: Je suis désolée de vous mêler à ça.

translation.en: You have nothing... nothing to be sorry about.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas à être désolée pour cela.

translation.en: Just... try to get some rest, okay?
Good night.
Good night, Donna.
[teacher] The Executive Branch had three departments.
translation.fr: Le pouvoir exécutif était divisé en trois départements.

translation.en: There was the Department of State,
which was led by Thomas Jefferson.
There was the Department of Treasury, -which was led by-- -[door opens]
translation.fr: Le département du Trésor était dirigé par...

translation.en: [softly] Hey. I need to speak with Amber.
Oh, sure. Uh, Amber?
Okay, that's enough.
Amber, bring your things.
Have a seat.
Amber, this is Officer Rozick and Officer Garland.
translation.fr: Amber, voici les agents Rozick et Garland.

translation.en: I know what this is about.
translation.fr: Je sais de quoi il s'agit.

translation.en: My mom called, right?
I'll be right outside.
Amber, your mother, Rebecca Appleton,
was involved in an automobile accident early this morning.
translation.fr: a eu un accident de voiture ce matin.

translation.en: We're sorry to have to tell you, but she died of her injuries on the way to the hospital.
translation.fr: Elle a succombé à ses blessures avant d'arriver à l'hôpital.

translation.en: [Rozick] Amber, do you have any friends or relatives you can stay with tonight?
[Rozick] Okay. We'll need to contact them.
We also need you to come with us to answer a few questions.
translation.fr: Et nous avons quelques questions à te poser.

translation.en: Was she driving?
[Garland] She was the passenger.
The driver... also died in the collision.
translation.fr: Le conducteur a lui aussi été tué dans l'accident.

translation.en: Did anyone else get hurt?
[Rozick] It was a single-vehicle accident.
He was drunk.
Oliver. He was drunk, right?
They both were.
[Garland] The cause of the accident is still being investigated.
translation.fr: Les causes de l'accident sont encore indéterminées.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I need to use the bathroom.
[Ty] That's why I think it makes more sense if Leah comes after.
translation.fr: Ensuite, c'est au tour de Leah.

translation.en: [Jordan] Right. And then I follow.
-[Ty] That works. -[Chad] Yeah.
What do you think, Amber?
Should I go before or after Leah's juggling act?
translation.fr: Je passe avant ou après le numéro de jonglage ?

translation.en: Uh, it's... Whatever you guys want.
-After's fine. -Yeah. Yeah, that'd be good.
translation.fr: - Après, alors. - Oui, ça me va.

translation.en: When a verb ends in a silent "e," drop the "e"
translation.fr: Quand un verbe se termine par un "e" muet, on retire le "e"

translation.en: and add "ed" to form the past tense.
translation.fr: et on ajoute "ed" pour former le passé.

translation.en: "Joke" to "joked." "Hope" to "hoped."
Aren't we going to sing, Amber?
Not today.
[woman] Oh, but we love singing.
Sorry.
I bet you're sick of people asking you if you're okay.
translation.fr: Tu en as sûrement marre qu'on te demande si ça va.

translation.en: I ran away from her.
I went to your fancy vacation house.
translation.fr: J'étais dans ta super maison de vacances.

translation.en: I had fun while she needed me.
translation.fr: Je m'amusais pendant qu'elle avait besoin de moi.

translation.en: this is not your fault.
Then I came back, and I pushed her away.
translation.fr: À mon retour, je l'ai rejetée.

translation.en: This is on me.
Ready for Pittsburgh tomorrow?
Yeah, sure.
Listen, I can only imagine how hard it is for you right now.
translation.fr: J'imagine à quel point ce doit être dur pour toi, en ce moment.

translation.en: But...
you know, your talent,
the reason you earned this opportunity,
translation.fr: et tu as mérité cette audition.

translation.en: that's still there. That doesn't go away.
translation.fr: Et ça, personne ne te l'enlèvera.

translation.en: It's still in here.
So, the pain that you're feeling,
translation.fr: C'est pourquoi la douleur que tu ressens

translation.en: you know, the grief...
I think you just-- just channel it.
Channel it, put it into your song.
Because that's what an artist does.
translation.fr: C'est ce que font les artistes.

translation.en: And you...
You're an artist.
Thank you, Mr. Franks.
You have to finish your food, you can't just stare at it.
translation.fr: La nourriture, c'est fait pour être mangé.

translation.en: So your flight's at nine.
I figured we'd leave for the airport at 7:00 a.m. the latest, maybe even 6:30.
translation.fr: On devrait partir d'ici à 7 h au plus tard, voire 6h30.

translation.en: And, um, you're all set up for the dorm
translation.fr: Tu as une place dans la résidence

translation.en: and the student is gonna show you around.
You have enough money for the cab?
translation.fr: Tu as assez pour le taxi ?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm good.
Bobby?
How is he?
Bobby has a mass on his spleen.
translation.fr: Il a une grosseur au niveau de la rate.

translation.en: That's what's been causing his discomfort.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'il a mal.

translation.en: A mass? Is that cancer?
I don't know yet.
But either way, the treatment is exactly the same...
translation.fr: Dans tous les cas, le traitement est le même.

translation.en: We'll need to do surgery to remove the mass.
translation.fr: Il faut l'opérer et retirer la grosseur.

translation.en: If that's successful, he could make a full recovery.
translation.fr: Dans le meilleur des cas, il s'en remettra complètement.

translation.en: [Donna] Amber, where have you been?
You missed your flight.
Is everything okay?
[Amber] So that's twelve dollars an hour.
translation.fr: C'est 12 dollars de l'heure. OPÉRATION DE BBB

translation.en: Uh, and the most I could work is a ten-hour shift?
translation.fr: Et je peux travailler dix heures maximum.

translation.en: And overtime is time-and-a-half.
translation.fr: Les heures sup' sont payées 50 % de plus.

translation.en: Okay, thank you, Lloyd. I appreciate it.
How's he feeling?
[Amber] I gave him another painkiller.
translation.fr: Je lui ai donné un calmant.

translation.en: Well, um, I explained everything to the Admissions Office,
translation.fr: J'ai tout expliqué à la personne chargée des admissions

translation.en: and they were very understanding.
I think they can get you another audition slot.
I'm not going.
Amber, if it's about the plane ticket, -you don't have to-- -I can't audition, Donna.
translation.fr: - Pour le billet d'avion, tu... - Je ne peux pas le faire.

translation.en: Not until Bobby gets better.
[Ricky] Lloyd has hired Amber full-time at the donut shop.
translation.fr: Amber va travailler à plein temps au magasin de donuts.

translation.en: Also, she added to her hours at the retirement home.
translation.fr: Elle va faire plus d'heures à la maison de retraite.

translation.en: If she works 70 hours a week at minimum wage,
she could pay for Bobby's surgery in ten-and-a-half weeks.
translation.fr: elle pourra payer l'opération dans dix semaines et demie.

translation.en: You can't work 70 hours a week and go to school.
translation.fr: Tu n'auras plus le temps d'aller au lycée.

translation.en: I'm dropping out.
Dropping out? Amber, honey.
No, you can't do that, you can't throw everything away.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas tout laisser tomber comme ça.

translation.en: Donna, I really appreciate everything you've done--
It's not about that. It's about you and your future.
translation.fr: C'est ton avenir que tu mets en jeu.

translation.en: You have so much to look forward to, and so much talent. I can't let you--
translation.fr: Tu as la vie devant toi. Et avec ton talent, tu...

translation.en: Stop!
You're not her.
You're not who?
[Ty] What's going on?
You can't just drop out of school.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas arrêter le lycée.

translation.en: Ty, look, I am so tired. I just can't right now.
translation.fr: Je suis fatiguée, Ty. Je n'ai pas envie d'en parler.

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry about Bobby.
He's awesome. And I know that he's really important to you, but--
translation.fr: Il est super. - Il compte beaucoup pour toi, mais... - Arrête.

translation.en: Don't.
translation.fr: - Il compte beaucoup pour toi, mais... - Arrête.

translation.en: Don't say he's just a dog.
translation.fr: Ne dis pas que c'est juste un chien.

translation.en: Because he's not. Not to me.
translation.fr: Pour moi, il est plus que ça.

translation.en: You need money, right?
Let me help you. I can ask my parents.
-I'm handling it. -Listen to me, it can be a loan.
translation.fr: - Ça ira. - Ce serait un prêt.

translation.en: Okay? You can pay them back slowly while you finish school--
translation.fr: Tu les rembourserais après tes études...

translation.en: Ty, stop! I have this under control.
Damn it, Amber, you are so stubborn!
translation.fr: Tu es têtue comme une mule !

translation.en: You do so much for other people,
but when you need just a little bit of help, you push us all away.
translation.fr: mais tu refuses qu'on te vienne en aide.

translation.en: What is so bad about needing help?
translation.fr: Tu as le droit de te faire aider.

translation.en: Like, if you don't do this on your own, you're weak?
translation.fr: Mais tu as peur de paraître faible.

translation.en: Good job, Ty,
you figured it out.
I bet part of you is glad that you missed the audition.
translation.fr: Au fond, ça t'arrange d'avoir raté l'audition.

translation.en: Bobby got sick,
and you got an excuse to punish yourself for letting your mom down,
translation.fr: tu te punis d'avoir abandonné ta mère.

translation.en: which you didn't do.
You're suffering.
You're suffering, and you won't admit it.
translation.fr: Mais tu ne veux pas l'admettre.

translation.en: You expect the rest of us to sit by and watch you go down the drain,
translation.fr: Tu voudrais qu'on te laisse te détruire sans rien faire.

translation.en: and that is not fair!
"Not fair?"
I'm sorry, that must really suck, life not being fair.
translation.fr: Ce doit être terrible, d'avoir une vie aussi injuste.

translation.en: You know what you should do to make yourself feel better?
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que je ferais à ta place ?

translation.en: I don't know, you should hang out with your two parents at your vacation home.
translation.fr: J'irais dans ma maison de vacances avec mes deux parents.

translation.en: Maybe that'll help you get over life and its vast unfairness.
translation.fr: Ça devrait t'aider à supporter l'injustice de ta vie.

translation.en: -Amber-- -Leave me alone!
Just leave me alone.
Thank you.
Take the rack, both sides in,
translation.fr: On prend la grille par les deux côtés

translation.en: and you slowly...
drop them into the oil.
You wanna try it?
Sure.
♪ Always end up dying ♪
[Amber] Good boy. Good boy.
You know, it's a lot easier watching it this way.
translation.fr: C'est plus facile à regarder comme ça.

translation.en: What do you mean?
Well, my ears don't hurt from all your loud singing,
translation.fr: Sans quelqu'un qui passe son temps à chanter

translation.en: and talking, and terrible jokes.
translation.fr: et à raconter de mauvaises blagues.

translation.en: In fact, if you happen to see the old Amber,
well, you can tell her that...
it was a living hell just being around her.
translation.fr: que c'était un enfer d'être en sa compagnie

translation.en: All that disgusting cheer and helpfulness.
translation.fr: et de devoir subir sa joie de vivre et sa gentillesse.

translation.en: Optimism.
Well, she was insufferable.
I can't go.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas y aller.

translation.en: You've been putting this show on for the last three years.
translation.fr: Tu organises ce spectacle chaque année depuis trois ans.

translation.en: It's the last one you'll ever get to see.
translation.fr: C'est le dernier que tu verras.

translation.en: It's your night.
Sorry.
I have to finish my shift.
[Lloyd] No, you don't.
We're closed.
No. We close at midnight.
Usually, but we're out of donuts.
translation.fr: D'habitude, oui. Mais on n'a plus de donuts.

translation.en: These have been impounded.
Amber.
Go. Be with your friends.
I got this.
Why are all those people here?
translation.fr: Pourquoi il y a tant de monde ?

translation.en: Must be really into supporting brass instruments, I guess.
translation.fr: J'imagine que ce sont de grands amateurs de cuivres.

translation.en: Ty, that's way too many people for the Variety Show.
translation.fr: Ty, il n'y a jamais eu tant de monde.

translation.en: You think it's a lot of people?
I feel like there's...
a normal amount of people. Um...
translation.fr: qu'il y en a autant que d'habitude.

translation.en: Okay. All right. Yeah. Um...
We ended up changing the...
We ended up changing the proceeds to going to Bobby Big Boy's surgery.
translation.fr: de reverser les bénéfices pour l'opération de Bobby.

translation.en: -What? -I know. Yeah, I know.
Look, before you-- before-- before this gets out of hand,
translation.fr: Écoute, avant que ça... Avant que tu ne t'énerves,

translation.en: I want to say something. I want to say that I'm sorry. Okay?
translation.fr: je veux que tu saches que je suis désolé, d'accord ?

translation.en: I want to say that I'm sorry about the other--
Well, you know, I was...
I was way too hard on you.
I was frustrated.
I was frustrated because I care about you...
translation.fr: J'étais en colère parce que je tiens à toi.

translation.en: a lot.
All of these people care about you.
translation.fr: Tous ces gens tiennent à toi.

translation.en: They showed up for you. Okay?
translation.fr: C'est pour toi qu'ils sont venus.

translation.en: So for once, you're gonna have to deal with that, all right?
translation.fr: Pour une fois, il va falloir que tu l'acceptes. OK ?

translation.en: What if I don't know how?
Think of it as a gift.
Okay? Think of it as a gift that you're giving us
translation.fr: Un cadeau que tu nous fais

translation.en: by letting us help you.
Trust us.
We won't let you down.
Just over here.
Hi, Bobby.
Have a seat, the show's about to start.
Where are you going to sit?
Good evening, everyone,
and welcome to the "Save Bobby Big Boy" Variety Show!
translation.fr: et bienvenue à ce spectacle en l'honneur de Bobby.

translation.en: Now, we have some amazing acts lined up for you tonight.
translation.fr: Nous avons un tas de numéros fantastiques au programme.

translation.en: But before we get to those, I wanted to make a few opening remarks.
translation.fr: Mais avant de commencer, j'ai quelque chose à vous dire.

translation.en: As we all know,
Amber Appleton puts together this Variety Show every year
translation.fr: Amber Appleton organise toujours ce spectacle

translation.en: to raise money for various school causes.
translation.fr: dont les bénéfices vont à une juste cause.

translation.en: She's also helped the Drama Club mount their productions,
translation.fr: Elle a aidé le club de théâtre à monter une pièce,

translation.en: has lobbied the school board for better wheelchair access,
translation.fr: elle a milité pour l'installation de rampes d'accès pour handicapés

translation.en: and has made me countless delicious fried-egg sandwiches.
translation.fr: et elle m'a préparé d'innombrables et délicieux sandwichs.

translation.en: She teaches, she volunteers.
translation.fr: Elle donne des cours, elle fait du bénévolat.

translation.en: She's...
sorta like a rock star.
translation.fr: un peu comme une rock star.

translation.en: Just by being here tonight, she has helped me get over my...
translation.fr: En venant ce soir, elle m'a aidé à surmonter

translation.en: my massive, massive stage fright.
Honestly, I don't know, maybe. I still might throw up, we'll see.
translation.fr: Je ne garantis pas que je tiendrai jusqu'au bout.

translation.en: [Ty] Now...
even though it's really tough for her to admit,
translation.fr: même si c'est dur pour elle de l'admettre,

translation.en: Amber needs us.
Our goal tonight is to raise $8,000,
so that her dog, Bobby Big Boy, can get a life-saving operation.
translation.fr: pour financer l'opération de son chien Bobby Big Boy.

translation.en: We have raised over $2,000 in ticket sales alone so far.
translation.fr: Avec la vente des entrées, nous en sommes déjà à 2 000 $.

translation.en: So, please, get out your phones
translation.fr: Je vous demande donc de sortir vos téléphones

translation.en: and tweet, Instagram, Facebook, live stream,
translation.fr: et de partager sur les réseaux sociaux

translation.en: anything you can to help get the word out.
translation.fr: pour toucher un maximum de monde.

translation.en: So, let's get to our first act.
Do you bite your thumb at me, sir.
I do bite my thumb, sir.
Do you bite your thumb at me, sir?
translation.fr: Est-ce à moi que vous la faites ?

translation.en: No, sir.
translation.fr: Non, monsieur. Je ne vous fais pas la nique.

translation.en: I do not bite my thumb at you, sir, but I do bite my thumb, sir.
translation.fr: Non, monsieur. Je ne vous fais pas la nique. Mais je fais la nique, monsieur.

translation.en: -Do you quarrel, sir? -Quarrel, sir?
Draw, if you be men.
translation.fr: Dégainez, si vous êtes un homme.

translation.en: Yes, Jordan!
All right, let's refresh our page and see where we are.
translation.fr: Rafraîchissons la page pour voir où nous en sommes.

translation.en: Yes, we're getting there.
-Please, keep spreading the word. -[cheers and applause]
Next up, we have the punniest man alive.
Give it up for Ricky Lingo Starr Roberts!
translation.fr: Veuillez accueillir Ricky Ringag Starr Roberts !

translation.en: I'm here to talk to you about man's best friend.
translation.fr: Je viens vous parler du meilleur ami de l'homme.

translation.en: Well, one man's best friend. Mine.
translation.fr: Ou plutôt, de ma meilleure amie à moi.

translation.en: She's a human woman. Not a dog...
translation.fr: C'est une humaine, pas un chien.

translation.en: but she's got a great one in Bobby Big Boy.
translation.fr: Mais elle en a un super, Bobby Big Boy.

translation.en: Things lately,
they got a little ruff for these two,
translation.fr: la vie a été chienne pour eux.

translation.en: but we're here to give triple-B a new leash on life.
translation.fr: Ils ont à peine eu le temps de dire "ouaf".

translation.en: I can say Lapso-lutely amazing things about Amber,
translation.fr: Je peux vous dire qu'Amber est un "fin limier".

translation.en: but you all might Terrier your hair out.
And I don't want Amber to sit there
translation.fr: Si je vous raconte tout ça,

translation.en: and Rottweiler friends Schnauzer off in front of everyone.
translation.fr: c'est pour que vous sachiez "toutou" sur "Am-beagle".

translation.en: So embarrassed of all the Shih Tzu here,
that she Pekingese eyes out from behind her hands.
translation.fr: J'ai husky-lisé les pires blagues que je colley-ssais.

translation.en: I'll keep things Pug-ressing for a Spaniel be able to handle,
translation.fr: Si personne ne se "braque", je continuerai à faire le "cabotin".

translation.en: and then Retriever.
[Ricky] Amber...
you Mastiff known I would take this speech,
translation.fr: Tu viens tous les "mâtins" m'aider à me préparer.

translation.en: and Basset on the fact that you're a Great Dane...
translation.fr: Alors il "fox" que je te le dise "teckel" :

translation.en: and my best friend in the whole world.
Thank you.
All right, let's take another look at where we are.
Almost $6,000. Yes.
Let's keep those pledges coming in.
And now, for our last act of the night,
translation.fr: Maintenant, notre dernier numéro de la soirée.

translation.en: ladies and gentlemen, the Korean Divas,
translation.fr: Mesdames et messieurs, les Korean Divas

translation.en: accompanied by our very own McKinley High marching band,
translation.fr: accompagnées par la fanfare du lycée McKinley

translation.en: and their brand new tuba.
[Jordan] Sousaphone!
How'd they get the tuba?
I don't know. Ricky said something about the "dark web."
translation.fr: Ricky m'a parlé du dark web, je crois.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, The Korean Divas and the McKinley High Marching Band!
translation.fr: Mesdames et messieurs, les Korean Divas et la fanfare de McKinley !

translation.en: Okay, let's take another look.
Six thousand, three hundred and four dollars.
translation.fr: Six mille trois cent quatre dollars.

translation.en: I'd like to thank all the acts, everybody who contributed.
translation.fr: Je remercie tous les artistes et tous les donateurs.

translation.en: It's been an awesome night. Thank you so, so much.
translation.fr: C'était une super soirée. Merci infiniment.

translation.en: Now, we didn't quite make our goal, but we'll keep the page open.
translation.fr: L'objectif n'est pas atteint mais la page reste ouverte, alors continuez de partager.

translation.en: So please keep spreading the word.
translation.fr: mais la page reste ouverte, alors continuez de partager.

translation.en: Everybody, our guest of honor, Amber Appleton!
translation.fr: Veuillez accueillir notre invitée d'honneur, Amber Appleton !

translation.en: This is overwhelming. I'm not...
a hundred percent sure this is happening yet.
translation.fr: Je n'arrive toujours pas à y croire.

translation.en: But I'm so happy that the marching band got their tuba.
translation.fr: Je suis contente que la fanfare ait un tuba.

translation.en: Hope is the thing with feathers.
My mom loved that poem.
We'd read it at bedtime for...
translation.fr: On le lisait tous les soirs

translation.en: as long as I can remember.
It's about finding hope,
even in the darkest of times.
My mom always had hope,
and so did I.
Until I lost it.
But you all helped me find it again.
translation.fr: Grâce à vous, je l'ai retrouvé.

translation.en: I don't know how to repay you.
But I guess that's the point.
I don't have to repay you.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas à le faire.

translation.en: I just have to take the gift that you've given me
translation.fr: Je n'ai qu'à prendre ce cadeau que vous me faites

translation.en: and use it.
And I will.
So, thank you.
I'm so grateful.
Should we take one last look at our total?
[boy] Whoo-hoo! Do it!
Is this a joke?
Um, can we get a refresh on that, please?
I think it's real.
Ty, did you--
No. I promise you, I had nothing...
translation.fr: Pas du tout, je te jure.

translation.en: I don't know.
Looks like we got an anonymous donation of $200,000,
translation.fr: Nous avons reçu un don anonyme de 200 000 $

translation.en: bringing our total to $206,844.
translation.fr: ce qui porte le total à 206 844 $ !

translation.en: [Amber] Hi, Mr. Linder.
It's me, Amber Appleton.
Do you remember me?
Are we related?
No, I work here on the weekends,
translation.fr: Non, je travaille ici le week-end.

translation.en: but I had some extra donuts, so I thought I'd stop by.
translation.fr: Je vous ai apporté des donuts.

translation.en: You want one?
What's this?
Well, just open it.
Oh, for God's sake, it's not a bomb. Open it.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une bombe, ouvre-le !

translation.en: [Joan] Told you I'd make you cry.
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit que je te ferais pleurer.

translation.en: Joan...
No.
Yes.
What am I supposed to do with all that dough, huh?
translation.fr: Que veux-tu que je fasse de mon argent ?

translation.en: Line my coffin with it?
I don't have any family left.
Well, that's not exactly true.
Actually, you're my family.
And you can make better use of it than anyone else I know.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu en feras bon usage.

translation.en: Oh, God, no. No more waterworks. I only wanted to see it the one time.
translation.fr: Je t'en prie, coupe les vannes ! Une fois, ça suffit largement !

translation.en: Well, I can't help that.
Come here.
[Donna] Wake up, sweetie.
Good boy.
-Bye. -Bye.
-Bye, Bobby. -♪ Feeling is all I have ♪
-♪ Find the words I need to see ♪ -You got this.
[woman] Amber Appleton?
That's me.
